title: Table Cover, ca. 1900
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: cutwork with needle lace
creditline: Gift of Mrs. William Bayard Cutting in memory of Mary E. Parsons
description: Rectangular panel of linen ornamented with small squares containing leaves worked in needle lace and larger squared containing birds worked in needle lace, edged with narrow bobbin lace.

participants.person_name: Sybil Carter Indian Mission and Lace Industry Association
